name: Gift of Snow
description:
A snowman holding an armful of presents takes an evening stroll to the anticipated Christmas party that is held once a year at the trusty, old cabin. 

Uh-oh! A strong wind pushes by and ends up blowing all the presents out of his arms.

Help him find all the presents scattered across the forest before the party starts. 

Expected Play Time: 5 - 10 minutes

This game was made during the UNLV Rebel Game Jam.
